DOC.brief_title: Discontinuation Study Durability Effect Milnacipran Treatment Fibromyalgia
DOC.criteria: Currently participate Study MLNMD06 Receiving stable dosage milnacipran ( 50200 mg/d ) Screening/Enrollment ( Visit 1 ) Significant risk suicide History mania , bipolar disorder , psychotic disorder , schizophrenia , current episode major depressive disorder Myocardial infarction and/or stroke within prior 12 month Mean systolic blood pressure > 180 mm Hg mean diastolic blood pressure > 110 mm Hg Screening ( Visit 1 ) Active liver disease Severe renal impairment Platelet bleeding disorder Female patient pregnant breastfeeding
